fields.name: primary_id
fields.title: Primary Registry and Trial Identifying Number
fields.description: Name of Primary Registry, and the unique ID number assigned by the Primary Registry to this trial.

fields.name: registration_date
fields.title: Date of Registration in Primary Registry
fields.description: Date when trial was officially registered in the Primary Registry.

fields.name: secondary_ids
fields.title: Secondary Identifying Numbers
fields.description: Other identifiers besides the Trial Identifying Number allocated by the Primary Registry, if any.

fields.name: secondary_ids
fields.title: Secondary Identifying Numbers
fields.description: Other identifiers besides the Trial Identifying Number allocated by the Primary Registry, if any.

fields.name: source_of_funding
fields.title: Source(s) of Monetary or Material Support
fields.description: Major source(s) of monetary or material support for the trial (e.g. funding agency, foundation, company, institution).

fields.name: primary_sponsor
fields.title: Primary Sponsor
fields.description: The individual, organization, group or other legal entity which takes responsibility for initiating, managing and/or financing a study. The Primary Sponsor is responsible for ensuring that the trial is properly registered. The Primary Sponsor may or may not be the main funder.

fields.name: secondary_sponsors
fields.title: Secondary Sponsors
fields.description: Additional individuals, organizations or other legal persons, if any, that have agreed with the primary sponsor to take on responsibilities of sponsorship.

fields.name: public_contact
fields.title: Contact for Public Queries
fields.description: Email address, telephone number and postal address of the contact who will respond to general queries, including information about current recruitment status.

fields.name: scientific_contact
fields.title: Contact for Scientific Queries
fields.description: There must be clearly assigned responsibility for scientific leadership to a named Principal Investigator. The PI may delegate responsibility for dealing with scientific enquiries to a scientific contact for the trial. This scientific contact will be listed in addition to the PI.

fields.name: public_title
fields.title: Public Title
fields.description: Title intended for the lay public in easily understood language.

fields.name: scientific_title
fields.title: Scientific Title
fields.description: Scientific title of the study as it appears in the protocol submitted for funding and ethical review. Include trial acronym if available.

fields.name: countries
fields.title: Countries of Recruitment
fields.description: The countries from which participants will be, are intended to be, or have been recruited at the time of registration.

fields.name: conditions
fields.title: Health Condition(s) or Problem(s) Studied
fields.description: Primary health condition(s) or problem(s) studied (e.g., depression, breast cancer, medication error).

fields.name: interventions
fields.title: Intervention(s)
fields.description: For each arm of the trial record a brief intervention name plus an intervention description.

fields.name: eligibility_criteria
fields.title: Key Inclusion and Exclusion Criteria
fields.description: Inclusion and exclusion criteria for participant selection, including age and sex. Other selection criteria may relate to clinical diagnosis and co-morbid conditions; exclusion criteria are often used to ensure patient safety.

fields.name: study_type
fields.title: Study Type
fields.description: Type of study (interventional or observational), study design and phase (if applicable).

fields.name: enrollment_date
fields.title: Date of First Enrollment
fields.description: Anticipated or actual date of enrolment of the first participant.

fields.name: sample_size
fields.title: Target Sample Size
fields.description: Number of participants that this trial plans to enrol in total.

fields.name: recruitment_status
fields.title: Recruitment status of this trial
fields.description: Recruitment status of this trial: Pending, Recruiting, Suspended, Complete, Other

fields.name: primary_outcomes
fields.title: Primary Outcome(s)
fields.description: Outcomes are events, variables, or experiences that are measured because it is believed that they may be influenced by the intervention.

fields.name: secondary_outcomes
fields.title: Key Secondary Outcomes
fields.description: Secondary outcomes are outcomes which are of secondary interest or that are measured at timepoints of secondary interest. A secondary outcome may involve the same event, variable, or experience as the primary outcome, but measured at timepoints other than those of primary interest.
